introduction: SYNOPSISJoo-hwan, an attorney, is happily married to Eun-hee and they have two kids. His new client Hae-soo is accused of excessive self-defense and attempted murder. She refuses counsel and shows signs of psychological disintegration. Joo-hwan successfully defends Hae-soo citing trauma from childhood sexual assault as the cause of her actions. Released from custody, Hae-woo becomes obsessed with Joo-hwan. Eun-hee, on the verge of losing her sight, asks him for a divorce but with the help of their kids, the two keep their marriage intact. Joo-hwan tries to help Eun-hee regain her full sight but tragedy strikes when Eun-hee and Hae-soo physically struggle on the veranda. Joo-hwan returns home to find Hae-soo dead on the ground. Joo-hwan holds Eun-hee, relieved that the nightmare has ended, but Eun-hee feels resentment building inside her.故事律师Juhan与妻子Eun-hee和他的兄弟姐妹是一位快乐的族长。有一天，她接管了一个名叫徐素的女人的案件，她拒绝以过度防御和企图谋杀来捍卫她。朱欢调查过去曾遭兄弟朋友性侵的海口，捍卫海水，盲目而无情地释放海水。当他喜欢朱欢的时候，他有着失明的危险。然而，那些在孩子的帮助下已经证实对方的爱的人团聚，菊花正在集中精力恢复恩熙的视线。海水接近恩熙，在门廊进行死亡斗争。乍一看，当他通过海水时，他从阳台回来了。祝欢拥抱恩熙，意识到噩梦已经结束，恩熙的内心仍然是陌生的。
